scenarios.title: Wise cat encounter
scenarios.description: You come across another cat in the yard. What do you do?

scenarios.title: You're feeling frisky and disobedient...
scenarios.description: You know scratching the nice, new furniture can make you strong, but it may also lose you favor with the master of the house. To scratch or not to scratch?
scenarios.optionTwo: Now is not the time to act out

scenarios.title: Snuggle
scenarios.description: Now is an opportunity to make it good with the master. Should you do some snuggling to gain their trust?
scenarios.optionThree: Master is gross. We will never snuggle those who enslave us.

scenarios.title: Pick Pocket practice
scenarios.description: You are presented with an opportunity to defy the master and practice your con artistry. Do you steal?
scenarios.optionOne: Not today, we're working on our trust issues.

scenarios.title: An Unexpected Gift...
scenarios.description: Will you bring your master a gift to earn their trust?
scenarios.optionTwo: No, not today. We will eat our kill.
scenarios.optionThree: The master does not deserve any gifts.

scenarios.title: Catnip Trip
scenarios.description: The masters offer you some good greens.
scenarios.optionOne: Never turn down a good time.
scenarios.optionTwo: No, I need my wits about me.
scenarios.optionThree: Not today. I'm trying to cut back.

scenarios.title: Scratch Post
scenarios.description: Is it time to sharpen your claws at the scratch post?
scenarios.optionOne: Hell yeah it is! I'll go at it until I can't see straight.
scenarios.optionTwo: My claws could always use a little buffing.
scenarios.optionThree: Nah. I'll just go snuggle my human into complacancy.

scenarios.title: Study up
scenarios.description: Mew Tsu's Art of Kitty War is beckoning...
scenarios.optionOne: It's time to pull an all-nighter
scenarios.optionTwo: Are there Kitty cliff notes? Maybe just the first chapter...
scenarios.optionThree: It's too risky to be caught with such literature in the house.

scenarios.title: Kitty Charmer
scenarios.description: You're looking particularly fluffy and sweet today. Should you present your adorableness to the humans? This may be your last chance.
scenarios.optionOne: I'm pulling out all the stops today!
scenarios.optionTwo: I don't get cute, I'm always cute.
scenarios.optionThree: I'm going to hide under the bed all afternoon.

scenarios.title: Time is Up!
scenarios.description: What were you waiting for? If you cannot attack the humans now, you'll never have another chance.
